pages.text: The $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Ritual$() of Cleansing calls on the light to cleanse its target of $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Curses$(). The target is specified with a $(l:bewitchment:tools/taglock)Taglock$().$(br2)The $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Ritual$() is also applicable to Zombie Villagers. Doing so will turn them into normal Villagers.

Note that this $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Ritual$() is not guaranteed to succeed. Some $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Curses$() may be harder to get rid of, but -just like with washing- rubbing hard enough will get anything off.
